Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Campbell
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Thorndale
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Thorndale due to a track condition.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Thorndale due to a track condition.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Thorndale at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Thorndale to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yello Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions at Howard.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, such as the #97 Skokie or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Purple Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions at Howard. 

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Howard and Linden.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #201 Central/Ridge bus.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
